articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: New Space Telescope Aims to Show 'Dark Universe' - VOA Learning English
articles.description: The European Space Agency released the first images from the new Euclid space telescope this week. Scientists hope Euclid will help them understand dark matter and dark energy better.
articles.content:
European astronomers released the first images from the new Euclid space telescope last week.
The European Space Agency (ESA) and the U.S. space agency, NASA, designed Euclid to study dark matter an… [+4302 chars]
